name: Whiterun Guard
description: The military force responsible for protecting Whiterun Hold and maintaining order in the city. Known for their discipline and loyalty to the Jarl.
goals: Maintain order and enforce the law

clock.name: Dragon Defense Preparations
clock.description: The guard is preparing defenses against dragon attacks

notable_members: Lydia - Housecarl assigned to the Thane
status: Active and vigilant due to dragon threat
notes: The Whiterun Guard is currently on high alert due to reports of dragon sightings. They are working to fortify the city's defenses.
